sections.title: Brightness Seeker (3.5E) (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Brightness Seeker (3.5E) class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: **Discover Omen (Su)** (Brightness Seeker (3.5E))
sections.description: Allows the Brightness Seeker to spend 1 hour meditating to forecast omens for creatures within 30 feet, granting them a one-time insight bonus equal to class level that can be applied to rolls or AC.

sections.title: **Favored Pilgrim (Ex)** (Brightness Seeker (3.5E))
sections.description: Improves initial attitudes of elves who believe in the Brightness, moving hostile, unfriendly, or indifferent elves one step closer to friendly.

sections.title: **Channel Past Incarnation (Su)** (Brightness Seeker (3.5E))
sections.description: Allows the Brightness Seeker to manifest animal qualities from past incarnations for 1 day after 1 hour of meditation, choosing from options like natural attacks, senses, or movement abilities.

sections.title: **Tranquility (Ex)** (Brightness Seeker (3.5E))
sections.description: Grants a +10 resistance bonus on saving throws against fear effects due to understanding death as merely a threshold to another existence.

sections.title: **Common Ground (Ex)** (Brightness Seeker (3.5E))
sections.description: Grants the wild empathy ability using class level and Charisma bonus, allowing influence over natural creatures and stacking with other sources of wild empathy.

sections.title: **Wild Shape (Su)** (Brightness Seeker (3.5E))
sections.description: Grants the ability to wild shape as a druid once per day (twice at 5th level), with uses and effective levels stacking with other wild shape sources.

sections.title: **One With Nature (Sp)** (Brightness Seeker (3.5E))
sections.description: Allows casting commune with nature as a spell-like ability at will, requiring 10 minutes of uninterrupted concentration like the normal spell.

sections.title: **Tranquility Aura (Ex)** (Brightness Seeker (3.5E))
sections.description: Extends the fear resistance as an aura, granting all friendly creatures within 10 feet a +10 resistance bonus on saves against fear effects.

sections.title: **Rebirth (Su)** (Brightness Seeker (3.5E))
sections.description: Allows reincarnation as a healthy adult animal after violent death, retaining abilities but gaining animal traits and a negative level until gaining experience or dying again.
